item.description:
We're going to have a happy hour together in downtown West Hartford and have some drinks. The location is Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar, click the link below to check it out:

http://www.flemingsst...

We'll arrive at 6pm and mingle for a while. After a bit we'll visit some other nearby nice venues like Max's or Cuvee.

Hartford Young Professionals and Entrepreneurs (HYPE) is having a get together at Fleming's also that night so we'll be mingling with some of them to. If you have a business card go ahead and bring it, it'll be a good opportunity to network for you.

Dress nicely and let's have a nice evening.

Tara also writes:

It's in Blue Back and a rather nice restaurant. Can easily head
from there down to Cuvee Lounge for drinks, or some other place
for dinner. It should be a good one.

HYPE's link: http://www.metrohartf...
item.name: Happy Hour at Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar
